trans-unit.source: This is a refactoring which simplifies the process of creating test accessors using the 'TestAccessor' pattern.

trans-unit.source: Defaultable types should have defaultable fields.

trans-unit.target: 可設定預設值的類型 '{0}'，有無法設定預設值的欄位或自動屬性 '{1}'

trans-unit.source: 'GetTestAccessor()' is a helper method reserved for testing. Production code must not call this member.
trans-unit.target: GetTestAccessor() 是留待測試用的協助程式方法。實際執行程式碼不可呼叫此成員。

trans-unit.source: Do not call 'GetTestAccessor()' from production code
trans-unit.target: 請勿從實際執行程式碼呼叫 GetTestAccessor()

實作 Iequatable 時覆寫 Object.Equals(object)

實作 Iequatable 時覆寫 Object.Equals(object)
請勿叫用 Diagnostic.Descriptor

trans-unit.source: Accessing the 'Descriptor' property of 'Diagnostic' in compiler layer leads to unnecessary string allocations for fields of the descriptor that are not utilized in command line compilation. Hence, you should avoid accessing the 'Descriptor' of the compiler diagnostics here. Instead you should directly access these properties off the 'Diagnostic' type.
trans-unit.target: 存取編譯器層級中 Diagnostic 的 Descriptor 屬性，會導致對命令列編譯中未使用的描述元欄位，配置了不必要的字串。因此，應避免存取此處編譯器診斷的 Descriptor。而應改為直接存取診斷類型的這些屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke property '{0}' on type '{1}', instead directly access the required member{2} on '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 請勿在類型 '{1}' 上叫用屬性 '{0}'; 而是改為直接存取 '{1}' 上的必要成員 {2}

trans-unit.source: 'SymbolDeclaredEvent' must be generated for source symbols
trans-unit.target: 必須為來源符號產生 SymbolDeclaredEvent

trans-unit.source: Compilation event queue is required to generate symbol declared events for all declared source symbols. Hence, every source symbol type or one of its base types must generate a symbol declared event.
trans-unit.target: 必須要有編譯事件佇列，才可為所有宣告的來源符號產生符號宣告事件。因此，每個來源符號類型或它的其中一個基底類型，必須產生符號宣告事件。

trans-unit.source: 'SymbolDeclaredEvent' must be generated for source symbols
trans-unit.target: 必須為來源符號產生 SymbolDeclaredEvent

trans-unit.source: Do not mix attributes from different versions of MEF
trans-unit.target: 請勿混合來自不同 MEF 版本的屬性

trans-unit.target: 請勿混合來自不同 MEF 版本的屬性

trans-unit.source: Attribute '{0}' comes from a different version of MEF than the export attribute on '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 屬性 '{0}' 來自與 '{1}' 上的匯出屬性不同的 MEF 版本

trans-unit.source: Parts exported with MEFv2 must be marked with 'SharedAttribute'
trans-unit.target: 使用 MEFv2 匯出的部分必須標記為 Shared

trans-unit.target: 使用 MEFv2 匯出的部分必須標記為 Shared 屬性。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is exported with MEFv2 and hence must be marked with 'SharedAttribute'
trans-unit.target: '{0}' 以 MEFv2 所匯出，因此必須標記為「共用」
